overview:
Tom Leone is the CFO of Bridge Energy Group.

Mr. Leone has over 25 years of experience in various senior finance leadership roles within the high-tech sector. As an experienced CFO, Mr. Leone has led several successful M&A transactions and worked with all business functions to help achieve corporate strategic goals. Prior to joining Bridge Energy Group, Mr. Leone served as CFO and COO of AccuSoft Corporation, an imaging software company. While at AccuSoft, he led the company through several years of profitable growth, ultimately resulting in a successful acquisition transaction for the shareholders. Mr. Leone previously served as CFO of several software and information technology consulting companies, including Applied Insurance Research, ADEPT, and CareTools, and held a variety of senior financial positions at Epsilon Data Management.

Mr. Leone received a BS in Business Administration with a concentration in Accounting from Bryant University and a Masters in Business Administration from Bentley University.
